title: multidice.io
author: multidice.io
created_time: July 06, 2022, 09:27:44 AMLast edit: September 06, 2022, 10:34:13 AM by multidice.io
content: We just launched the Multidice.io ICO (Initial coin offering).Buy Multidice Token (MDICE) and be part of the most advanced crypto betting site!MDICE Token specificationsName: Multidice TokenSymbol: MDICENetwork: ETH - ERC20Total supply: 40 000 000Price: 0.2$Hard cap: $3 880 000Soft cap: $760 000Multidice intends to become the new paradigm of online gambling, a place where players, creators and investors explore multigame, multicurrency and multiplayer global solutions.Token AllocationWe will be issuing 40 000 000 MDICE tokens as part of our ICO. No additional tokens will be created. 65% of the tokens will be sold in the successive rounds of the crowdsale.ICO Funds UsageMultidice.io will use the funds raised during the crowdsale for engineering & development, operations and administration, marketing & promotion, legal affairs, while keeping a reserve for unexpected expenses and future expansions. Airdrop & Bounties Multidice is launching an Official Airdrop and Bounties program to reward its supporters totaling 1 200 000 MDICE (3% of the total supply). Check the details of the Airdrop here.Affiliate programJoin the Multidice.io ICO Affiliate Program and receive up to 5% commission for every user that buys tokens through your link. You can build your network up to 3 levels of referrals.CommunityTwitterFacebookRedditYoutubeInstagramTelegramMultidice Public Sale is live - Buy MDICE tokens here

comments.author: koang
comments.body: Quote from: multidice.io on July 14, 2022, 09:53:10 AMThe 2nd week of the Multidice ICO Airdrop is ending soon!Don't forget to submit your weekly report to get free MDICE tokens. To submit the report, go to Multidice.io, sign up and follow the instructions.The gambling industry has proven to be resilient in both bear and bull markets, and the usage of cryptocurrencies in gambling stays constantBut there are plenty of Popular gambling sites out there, so what makes this project different and deserves more attention than existing sites?The airdrop (Bounty) that you launched did not get a good response from the community.Just 37 members on TG and 49 Followers on Twitter, So far

comments.author: multidice.io
comments.created_time: July 18, 2022, 11:01:12 AMLast edit: July 18, 2022, 02:41:45 PM by multidice.io
comments.body: Quote from: koang on July 15, 2022, 10:41:12 AMQuote from: multidice.io on July 14, 2022, 09:53:10 AMThe 2nd week of the Multidice ICO Airdrop is ending soon!Don't forget to submit your weekly report to get free MDICE tokens. To submit the report, go to Multidice.io, sign up and follow the instructions.The gambling industry has proven to be resilient in both bear and bull markets, and the usage of cryptocurrencies in gambling stays constantBut there are plenty of Popular gambling sites out there, so what makes this project different and deserves more attention than existing sites?The airdrop (Bounty) that you launched did not get a good response from the community.Just 37 members on TG and 49 Followers on Twitter, So farThanks for your feedback. We think that our site has a huge potential for grow. We are the crypto games site that accepts more currencies (50+). With our ICO we aim to expand our site, adding new games, new features and new currencies to Multidice.io.

comments.author: multidice.io
comments.body: We are working in some improvements before the launch of the Public Sale 1:Publication of the whitepaperChanges on the airdrop and bountiesImproved affiliate programMore detailed roadmap

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: multidice.io on September 01, 2022, 09:26:17 AMWe are working in some improvements before the launch of the Public Sale 1:Publication of the whitepaperChanges on the airdrop and bountiesImproved affiliate programMore detailed roadmapAs many know about casino tokens, only few of them actually are receiving positive interest from the players.Do you think you have your resources and plans that will make this token achieve what you want for this token?Also, the fate of the token usually depends on the performance of the gambling site itself. Are you dedicating the site to the dice game only? You have so many known competitors already when it comes to dice.

comments.author: multidice.io
comments.body: Multidice ICO Public Sale is liveThe Public Sale of Multidice ICO just started! You can buy MDICE token for $0.12, that's a 40% discount! The crowdsale will last 3 months with bonus decreasing every month. Check the details here.Improved Affiliates, Airdrop & BountiesWe increased the reward for the Affiliate program, now you can get up to 5% referral commission. We decided to separate the Airdrop (one time free reward) and the Bounty program (get rewards for doing tasks such as blog articles or youtube videos). Updated multidice.io websiteWe made some improvements in both our dice game website and ico website. We solved some minor bugs (for example: sorting of bankroll tables) and made some changes on the design. The ICO website now contains more information about Multidice project: new features, detailed roadmap, extended team.
